document_data.caption: The location of Melgard's (labeled 234) on a circa [[1357 DR]] map of [[Waterdeep]]
document_data.name: Melgard's Fine Leathers
document_data.mainbody: '''Melgard's Fine Leathers''' was a clothing store in the city of [[Waterdeep]].
document_data.Location: This store was located along the major intersection [[Waymoot (Waterdeep)|Waymoot]],
document_data.Structure: This building stood a single story tall.
